mapper.select: select QNA_ID, LEVEL REPLYLEVEL, REPLY_ID, REPLY_ROOT, CASE WHEN LEVEL = 1 THEN '' ELSE LPAD('→ ', LEVEL*2, '―') END || CASE WHEN REPLY_OUT = 'Y' THEN '**삭제된 댓글입니다**' ELSE REPLY_CONT END REPLY_CONT, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_OUT, REPLY_DATE FROM(select * from REPLY where QNA_ID = #{qnaId}) START WITH REPLY_ROOT is null CONNECT BY PRIOR REPLY_ID = REPLY_ROOT ORDER SIBLINGS BY REPLY_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE reply set reply_cont = #{replyCont} where reply_id = #{replyId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE reply set reply_out = 'Y' where reply_id = #{replyId}
